mapper.select: SELECT a.*,e.name as type_name,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.style as prod_style,c.spec as prod_spec,c.memo as prod_memo,c.unit as prod_unit,d.name as brand_name FROM ems_orderlist a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmenttype e on b.parent_id=e.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id where a.order_id=#{order_id}

select a.ecode,a.orderlist_id, decode(a.status,0,'no_storage','in_storage') as status, a.store_id, a.brand_id, a.prod_id, c.style, a.subtype_id, a.supplier_id, a.type_id, b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_barcode a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id where a.ecode=#{ecode}

SELECT a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.style as prod_style,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name FROM ems_Barcode a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id where a.orderlist_id=#{orderlist_id} and a.randomStr= #{randomStr} order by a.ecode
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment where orderlist_id=#{orderlist_id}
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment a,ems_orderlist b where a.orderlist_id=b.id and b.order_id=#{order_id}
